column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////JINYA has the best Ramen in town! I come here when ever I get the craving for authentic ramen. You are greeted as soon as you walk in by the lovely hostesses and are usually seated immediately. There are booths
column3: and community style seating. You can order ANYTHING off the menu and you will not be disappointed. Everything is delicious
column4: I recommend the spicy chicken ramen. The prices are very reasonable and you can leave with a full belly for around $20. My favorite waiter is Daniel. He is funny
column6: and really loves his job. Be sure to ask for him when you visit.
